section.p:
You succeed only in offending the merchant. He yells for the guards, and a dozen soldiers run out to arrest you. There are too many of them - you are seized and clapped in irons.
Lose all your money and possessions on your Adventure Sheet. After a few weeks in a cell, you are sold to slavers from Caran Baru. Eventually, you are bought by the navy of Yarimura.
